title: Red Receives Grandmother's Letter
summary: Red Riding Hood receives a letter from her ailing grandmother, requesting a special remedy from the village apothecary. Determined to help, Red packs the medicine and sets out through the forest, despite her mother's warning about the dangers along the path.

title: Red Meets the Mysterious Woodsman
summary: Red encounters a handsome, brooding woodsman named Elias while crossing a fallen tree bridge. They clash over which path is safest, with Elias insisting she let him escort her. Red refuses his offer, determined to prove her independence, and chooses the shortcut.

title: The Wolf's Offer and Hidden Agenda
summary: A charming stranger, Lucien (the Wolf in disguise), intercepts Red and offers to guide her to her grandmother's house. Sensing his ulterior motives, Red feigns agreement but secretly plans to outsmart him. Lucien takes a longer route to reach the cottage first.

title: Lucien Deceives Grandmother
summary: Lucien arrives at the cottage ahead of Red and tricks Grandmother into letting him in by pretending to be a helpful passerby. He locks Grandmother in the cellar, disguises himself with her shawl, and waits for Red, determined to win her trust—and her heart—by any means.

title: Red's Suspicion and Elias's Return
summary: Red arrives at the cottage and quickly senses something is wrong with 'Grandmother.' She pretends not to notice while secretly searching for clues. Meanwhile, Elias, suspicious of Lucien's intentions, tracks Red to the cottage and overhears Lucien's confession of affection for Red.

title: The Confrontation and Rescue
summary: Elias bursts into the cottage, accusing Lucien of foul play. A physical struggle ensues, during which Red frees her grandmother from the cellar. Red must choose whether to help Elias subdue Lucien or hear Lucien out when he confesses his love and desperate loneliness.

title: Red's Choice and A New Beginning
summary: Red demands honesty from both Lucien and Elias. Torn between Elias's protective nature and Lucien's vulnerable confession, Red ultimately decides to give Lucien a chance at redemption, on the condition he makes amends to Grandmother. The trio shares a tense, hopeful meal, hinting at new beginnings and budding romance.
